notes.text: This is the one-month notification for the end of the maintenance phase for Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise 3.6 and 3.7. This notification applies only to customers with subscriptions for Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise 3.6 and 3.7.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
As part of the maintenance phase, qualified security patches of Critical or Important impact, as well as select mission-critical bug-fix patches, were released for Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise 3.6 and 3.7.

After July 31st, 2019, customers will not receive those updates.

Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform Life Cycle Policy can be found under:

https://access.redhat.com/support/policy/updates/openshift
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

document.title: Red Hat Security Advisory: Red Hat OpenShift Enterprise one-month end-of-life notice
